Name: Canopic Box of Thuya
Description: The canopic box of Thuya is a wooden box on runners, decorated in gold. On the front, Isis is to the left and Nephthys is to the right. They face each other with a knob between them. The deities that protect the internal organs decorate the sides. On the rounded higher part of the lid is a knob decorated on top with a rosette. The sides of the lid are covered with a long wavy snake behind a Shen sign of power.
